  "patient_id": {{patient_id}},

  "lab_name": "Central Lab",
  "notes": "Test completed successfully"
}

request.description: Generate a QR code for patient assignment. The patient can show this QR code to a device for automatic assignment. QR code expires after specified hours (max 168 hours / 7 days). One-time use only.

exec: pm.test("Response contains a success field that is true", function () {
pm.test("Response time is less than 200ms", function () {
pm.test("The message field must be a non-empty string when success is true", function () {

request.description: Device scans a patient's QR code and assigns the patient to the device. The token from the QR code must be provided. This is a one-time operation - once used, the token becomes invalid.

exec: // Save the token to the environment variable "qr_token"
